rooms.name: The_North_Pole_-_Orientation
rooms.description: This is the entry point to this years KringleCon. In front of you you can see a green fence.

rooms.name: The_North_Pole_-_The_North_Pole
rooms.description: The main location of this years KringleCon and FrostFest. At the left side you can see the KringleCon building, at the right side there is the Frostfest tower.

objectives.name: Jingle_Ringford
objectives.description: an Elf standing next to a Terminal
